documents.document: @sarahprimrosex I quite enjoyed just going to something that was all planned, so much less faff! I did sort of miss seeing any fireworks though!
@little_magpie1 Definitely!! I hope yours feel better soon! 😘
@kirstywats Thanks so much! I bought one of the handheld bottles but I've never ran with it before so not sure Sunday is the best time to test that!
For the runners! Do you prefer to run a race carrying water? Or stop at a water stop? I'm thinking I'd rather not stop if I don't have to?!
@sarahprimrosex Last year I went to the thing at The Corn Exchange which was pretty good! 3 course dinner, ceilidh, disco etc!
@little_magpie1 Aww I feel for you! ❤ I just had 2 wisdom teeth out...and back in 2 weeks to get the other 2 out too!! 🙈
